name: apple-dev-mcp
description: Complete Apple development guidance: Human Interface Guidelines (design) + Technical Documentation (API) for iOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS

tools.name: search_guidelines
tools.description: Search Apple Human Interface Guidelines by keywords, with optional platform and category filters

tools.name: get_component_spec
tools.description: Get detailed specifications and guidelines for a specific UI component

tools.name: get_design_tokens
tools.description: Get design system values (colors, spacing, typography) for specific components

tools.name: get_accessibility_requirements
tools.description: Get accessibility requirements and guidelines for specific components

tools.name: get_technical_documentation
tools.description: Get Apple API documentation for frameworks and symbols with optional design guidance

tools.name: list_technologies
tools.description: List available Apple technologies, frameworks, and symbols

tools.name: search_technical_documentation
tools.description: Search Apple technical documentation with wildcard support

tools.name: check_updates
tools.description: Check for available updates for git repository, static content, and API documentation

tools.name: search_unified
tools.description: Unified search across both HIG design guidelines and technical documentation with cross-references

tools.name: search_wildcard
tools.description: Advanced wildcard pattern search with * and ? support across design and technical documentation

tools.name: get_cross_references
tools.description: Get cross-reference mappings between design guidelines and technical implementations

tools.name: generate_fused_guidance
tools.description: Generate comprehensive fused guidance combining design principles with technical implementation details

tools.name: generate_implementation_guide
tools.description: Generate detailed step-by-step implementation guide for a specific component

user_config.name: content_source
user_config.description: Choose whether to use static content (faster) or live scraping (more current)

user_config.name: enable_experimental_features
user_config.description: Enable experimental content fusion and advanced search features
